name: Sky Storm
description:
My latest game made in Unity. Objective of the game is to shoot down as many enemy planes as possible. Pick up power ups to keep your ammunition supplies high enough to defeat waves of enemies. Each plane that passes, costs you 10 health points. The further you come, more difficult it gets and more points you earn. 

Controls: A - D (move left and right), spacebar (shoot), escape (pause the game).
